title: Render projects in JS
description: Fetch projects.json and render project cards with optional fields handled gracefully.
notes: Changes: implemented fetch/render for projects.json with optional demo/future handling and safe DOM creation. Files: script.js. Verification: ran python3 http.server and fetched /index.html and /projects.json successfully; manual browser render should show project cards without console errors.

title: Add newly cloned repos to projects.json
description: Scan /home/jirving/projects/github for new repos and add structured entries to projects.json.
close_reason: Added new repos to projects.json and verified local render.

title: GitHub Pages compatibility
description: Ensure relative paths and fetch work locally and on GitHub Pages.
notes: Changes: kept relative fetch to projects.json and added file:// guidance message when local file access blocks fetch. Files: script.js. Verification: served locally via python3 http.server and confirmed 200 responses for index.html and projects.json; should work on GitHub Pages with relative paths.

title: Base Structure: scaffold core files
description: Create index.html, style.css, script.js, and projects.json in repo root. Ensure index.html loads without errors.
notes: Verification: ran 'python3 -m http.server 8000 --bind 127.0.0.1' (escalated due to sandbox port restrictions) and received HTTP 200 for /index.html via curl. Page loads locally.

title: Sync project list with current GitHub repos

notes: Removed status subtext from card UI and added TODO for default intelligent ordering. Files: script.js, style.css, TODO.md.

title: Add styling
description: Create clean, readable CSS with card layout and mobile-friendly spacing.
notes: Verification: served locally via python3 http.server and confirmed index.html/projects.json respond with 200; manually inspect in browser for layout and mobile responsiveness.

title: Basic HTML skeleton
description: Add header, intro, container, and link style.css/script.js in index.html.
notes: Index.html already includes header/title, intro paragraph, projects container, and links to style.css/script.js. Criteria met; no changes needed.

title: Add real project data to projects.json
notes: Changes: replaced placeholder entries with real project data for ai-pb, cpm-detail, example-projects, and project-index. Files: projects.json. Verify: python3 -m http.server 8000 --bind 127.0.0.1 and curl index.html/projects.json; page renders without console errors.

notes: Changes: updated repo structure list, added projects.json update note and local server preview step. Files: README.md.

title: Define and display repo status values prominently
description: Add distinct status values (e.g., WIP vs abandoned vs demo/one-off) and make status visually prominent; ensure ScanReconciliationTool marked as demo/one-off with no future ideas.
notes: Tightened status badge layout now that subtext is removed (reduced min-width for status container). File: style.css.
